doc:
Matt Adler https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Matt_Adler 0 Matthew D. "Matt" Adler (born December 8, 1966 in Los Angeles, California) is an American film actor. He is best known for his work in the 1980s for his supporting roles in the teenage films: Teen Wolf, White Water Summer, North Shore, and Dream a Little Dream. He currently works on additional dialogue recording for feature films. Matthew_D._"_Matt_"_Adler ( born December_8_,_1966 in Los_Angeles , California ) is an_American_film_actor . He is_best_known for his_work in the_1980s for his_supporting_roles in the_teenage_films : Teen_Wolf , White_Water_Summer , North_Shore , and Dream a_Little_Dream . He currently works on additional_dialogue_recording for feature_films .
